Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger

package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger
Provides the classes and interfaces to define the trigger and its executor.
Since:
2.0.0

    The scheduler.x core API

  • Class
    Description
    CronExpression
    Provides a parser and evaluator for unix-like cron expressions.
    CronTrigger
    Represents for inspecting settings specific to a CronTrigger, which is used to fire a Task at given moments in time, defined with Unix 'cron-like' schedule definitions.
    CronTrigger.CronTriggerBuilder
    Represents a builder that constructs CronTrigger
    CronTriggerExecutor
    Represents for the task executor has an execution loop based on the timer of cron expressions.
    CronTriggerExecutorBuilder
    Represents a builder that constructs CronTriggerExecutor
    IntervalTrigger
    Represents for inspecting settings specific to an interval trigger, which is used to fire a Task in periodic with repeat time.
    IntervalTrigger.IntervalTriggerBuilder
    Represents a builder that constructs IntervalTrigger
    IntervalTriggerExecutor
    Represents for the task executor has an execution loop based on interval.
    IntervalTriggerExecutorBuilder
    Represents a builder that constructs IntervalTriggerExecutor
    Trigger
    Represents for inspecting settings specific to a Trigger, which is used to fire a Task at given moments in time
